title: Lesson 3 — Why documentation exists in dbt
description: Documentation answers “what is this?” so teams do not reverse engineer the SQL.
concept: This makes the model understandable by pairing plain language with code.
hint: Add a comment like `-- doc: This model surfaces daily bookings` at the top.
